nodes.text: The scene certainly gave the appearance that Sheila Caffell had shot herself
Across her chest and pointing up at her neck through which the wounds that had killed her had been fired was the rifle used to shoot all five members of the family.
If a person shoots at himself the weapon is close to his corpse

The caller was the appellant and having given his name and address he said:    You've got to help me. My father has rang me and said  Please come over. Your sister has gone crazy and has got the gun.  Then the line went dead.
his sister had a history of psychiatric illness
he confirmed that there were guns at his father's house
